pr_title: fix(deps, prov-service): Remove SDK-side validation of max twin depth

timeline.message:
fix(deps, prov-service): Remove SDK-side validation of max twin depth

Depth limits may be arbitrarily changed by services, so there is no reason to validate them on the SDK side

timeline.bodyText: is the allow metadata still being used for any validation?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: there are other validations still being done; valid characters, size etc. This might be a good time to scrub through those and remove them.
replies.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: There are still a few validations on things like that which we could get rid of, sure. I'll take those out too.
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
